Trụ sở đặt tại Bình Dương – trung tâm công nghiệp liền kề thành phố náo nhiệt nhất – TP Hồ Chí Minh, công ty đã và đang cung cấp vải Denim đến nhiều nơi khác nhau trên thế giới.

cominfo.address: 202 Hoang Van Thu, ward 9, district Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh city
cominfo.name: Brenntag Vietnam Co., Ltd
cominfo.desc: Brenntag, the global market leader in chemical distribution, covers all major markets with its extensive product and service portfolio. Headquartered in Mülheim an der Ruhr, Germany, the company operates a global network with more than 490 locations in 72 countries. In 2014, the company, which has a global workforce of more than 13,500, generated sales of EUR 10.0 billion (USD 13.3 billion). Brenntag connects chemical manufacturers and chemical users. The company supports its customers and suppliers with tailor-made distribution solutions for industrial and specialty chemicals. With over 10,000 products and a world-class supplier base, Brenntag offers one-stop-shop solutions to around 170,000 customers. This includes specific application technology, an extensive technical support and value-added services such as just-in-time delivery, product mixing, formulation, repackaging, inventory management and drum return handling. Long-standing experience and local excellence in the individual countries characterize the global market leader for chemical distribution.

cominfo.name: TPC VINA Plastic & Chemical Corp., LTD.
cominfo.desc: TPC Vina Plastic & Chemical Corp., Ltd. (TPC Vina) was found in 1995 as the first petrochemical company in Vietnam, producing Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC). TPC Vina is a joint venture among Vietnam National Chemical Corporation (VINACHEM), Vietnam Plastic Corporation (VINAPLAST) and Thai Plastic and Chemicals Public Co., Ltd. (TPC), which is one of the largest PVC resin producer in ASEAN with more than 40 years of experience.
